changes.summary: Status changed from in-progress → completed. All 8 customer interviews done, persona deck delivered to Priya Sharma with 4 primary segments.
Updated progress notes. Technical fixes (site speed optimization, schema markup) are 70% complete. Content gap analysis started.
Slide deck now 60% complete. Added two new case studies; still need to finalize the B2B SaaS metrics section.
Legal review completed. Amendment expands scope to include investor relations comms (+15 hrs/month). Awaiting final deliverables language check.
New client signed! Vantage Partners engagement begins. Discovery phase starting with stakeholder interviews this week.
DataFlow's AP flagged $2,400 discrepancy on January invoice. Added as urgent — need to reconcile hours and send corrected invoice.
Draft completed and moved to Needs Review. Key highlight: 34% MQL increase. Needs proofread before sending to client.
Moved to Urgent. Campaign going live Feb 26 morning. Final creatives and audience segments need approval.

changes.itemTitle: CloudNine Ventures — Urgent Investor Deck Feedback
changes.summary: Priya Sharma sent revised investor deck overnight. Moved to Urgent — feedback needed before their 4 PM board meeting today.
Status changed from in-progress → pending-review. Draft proposal completed and ready for final review of pricing tiers before submission to Marcus Rivera.
Status changed from in-progress → completed. TechBridge campaign launched successfully across all channels this morning.
New item added: Apex Dynamics Q2 strategy proposal — initial brief received from Marcus, scoping in progress.
Status changed from action-needed → in-progress. Billing discrepancy resolved after corrected invoice sent and confirmed by AP team.

changes.itemTitle: CloudNine Ventures — Urgent Investor Deck Feedback
changes.summary: Deadline updated from Feb 26 → Mar 1. Investor deck review rescheduled at client request — board meeting postponed.
